Articles.Content:
You might know me from /r/kerbalspaceprogram, because I post there often but I haven't used the official forum before. I bought the game two weeks before 1.0 without realizing that was coming, and since then I've racked up close to 500 hours of playing. I've built more rockets than payloads, my two favorite so far being replicas of the Soviet Energia/Buran and NASA's SLS Block 2.

And that's pretty much all there is to say (for now).
Welcome to forums, commanderspork! Those replica rockets sound really cool.

Yes, they do sound cool. Post them! I WANT SEE!

Welcome aboard!

Kenergia: http://kerbalx.com/CommanderSpork/Kenergia

Kerbin Launch System: http://kerbalx.com/CommanderSpork/KLS

A little bird informed me that people were downloading the KLS just to rip off the SRB's, so I made a separate download: http://kerbalx.com/CommanderSpork/Advanced-Solid-Rocket-Booster

Hi CommanderSpork

I have curiously looked at your rocketbooster assembly and its great!

Its the right size for a Stock KSP Space shuttle solidboosterstage...
Hello and welcome to the forums CommanderSpork, hope you enjoy the community here!
